amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for various economic development programs and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds from various accounts and applying the savings to the spending reduction accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 276 (Roll no. 334).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 276 (Roll no. 334).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Chabot.
